long_description: With conductive material on the thumbs and index fingers, the REI Boulder Ridge Tech-Compatible fleece gloves help keep boys' hands warm while letting them text and play games on touch-screen devices. Breathable and quick-drying, hard-face fleece fabric repels water and resists wind; snug fit preserves dexterity. Grippy polyurethane palms.
